Full Area Gray 8 High Speed Applet (FAG8_HS)

for microEnable IV AD4-CL
for microEnable IV VD4-CL
.

Description
..

The hardware applet Full Area Gray 8 High-Speed enables the operation of a gray scale camera. Supported are all gray scale area-scan cameras in the Full Configuration 8 taps /10 taps of the CameraLink standard and a resolution of up to 8,192 x 65,535 pixels.


Highlights
.
  • Support of all full gray CameraLink input formats (Full 8bit/pixel at up to 85MHz)
  • Transfer rates of up to 850 MB/s on quad line PCIe systems are reachable - High Performance PCIe x4 Interface required!
  • Highly customizable Trigger System
  • Max. image dimension of 8,192 x 65,535 pixel
  • 8bit output per pixel (Gray8)
  • Hardware generated image number
  • Regions of Interest support
  • Image selector
  • Latency of a single line
  • Support of CameraLink RS232 interface clser
  • Camera detection abilities
  • DigI/O
  • CC signals
  • Miscellaneous
.


References
.

SDK Documentation
.
